description:
Join Our Production Team!

Are you a dedicated professional with a passion for overseeing production processes? We are looking for a Production Supervisor to join our team at our dynamic manufacturing facility!

Qualifications

  • Associate degree preferred
  • Minimum of 3 years of experience in a production environment, with at least 1 year in a supervisory role
  • Ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment and manage multiple priorities efficiently
  • Proficient in reading, interpreting documents, and writing reports
  • Strong verbal communication skills
  • Excellent mathematical, problem-solving, and decision-making abilities
  • Proficiency in MS Excel and MS Word; experience with MS PowerPoint and MS Access is a plus

Responsibilities

  • Supervise production processes and ensure efficiency
  • Uphold delegation of authority and follow management instructions
  • Exhibit excellent attendance, punctuality, and reliability
  • Work both independently and collaboratively as part of a team
  • Willingness to work flexible hours, including weekends as needed
  • Physical ability to stoop, kneel, crouch, or crawl as required
  • Ability to lift and move objects up to 50 pounds, occasionally with the assistance of other team members or equipment

If you are ready to take the next step in your career as a Production Supervisor, apply now to be part of our innovative team!

Employment Type: Full-Time
